Features.ColourCorrection.Dialogue.Title: Colour Correction
Features.ColourCorrection.Description: Helps people with poor vision, light sensitivity, or colour-blindness. Playing around with the colour settings can give everything a warm, or cool hue.
Features.ColourCorrection.Dialogue.lblPr: Simulates a specific type of colour vision deficiency.
Features.ColourCorrection.Dialogue.lblRe: Changes how much Red to apply to the scene.
Features.ColourCorrection.Dialogue.lblGr: Changes how much Green to apply to the scene.
Features.ColourCorrection.Dialogue.lblBl: Changes how much Blue to apply to the scene.
Features.ColourCorrection.Dialogue.lblSa: Changes the colour saturation of the scene. Lower values fade colours out, higher values make colours more vibrant.
